channel.title: [OFFICIAL] TNT Applications topic
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]TNT[/size][/center]
We've got it sorted out now, I'm sure everybody will be happy to hear. If you feel you meet the criteria stated below then please feel free to apply to have TNT access, there is no application form as such you just have to make a post stating clearly that you want permission to use TNT.
Before you apply you must meet the following criteria:
[ul][li]No history of griefing[/li][li]No others offenses/concerns which deem you a risk[/li][li]Played for a substantial amount of time (as in ingame time, not I played on the first map then vanished until now)[/li][li]A secure account[/li][/ul]
The following rules must be met:
[ul][li]Using it in PVP isn't allowed AT ALL[/li][li]Using it grief obviously isn't allowed.[/li][li]Do not leave it floating around placed - anyone can activate TNT, and if somebody griefs with TNT you've left placed then you'll be held responsible.[/li][li]Use your common sense when using it.[/li][li]Try to bend, and find loop holes in these rules and you'll just have your permissions removed.[/li][li]You mess the environment up, you clean it up.[/li][/ul]
If we suspect you to be a risk, or you breach any of these rules we withhold the right to remove your permission to use TNT at any time we please. If you're denied the usage of TNT you will be PMed the same goes for if you're accepted.
If you get denied and are unhappy about it do not spam this thread as you will be infracted, moaning won't get you reconsidered. Patience will. Just because you get denied doesn't mean we deem you untrustworthy, we have a number of variables to consider before giving anyone TNT permission so please don't linger on it :)
Just because you've been denied it once, doesn't mean you cannot apply again in the future.
Just as a note, if you destroy the environment then it is your responsibility to make it look respectable again. Don't go around blowing holes everywhere, or huge craters. This is a limited map in W2 last thing we need is huge holes everywhere.
Happy applying I guess :P

item.title: [OFFICIAL] TNT Applications topic
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I would love TNT perms so I can clear out some abandoned mines and make room for building underground. I’ve been playing Moparcraft on and off for a couple of years now. My history is a bit shaky, and I have been punished once for griefing, after being killed unfairly. My account is completely secure and has never been used by anyone besides myself. I believe I have learned from my mistakes in the past, and have become more mature, therefore I think I should atleast be given an chance.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [OFFICIAL] TNT Applications topic
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I have one history of griefing, (I think) and that was breaking a few blocks of agls house (On accident) i mined a block and it let in water, i replaced it and gave agl diamonds as an apology, and I think once i broke like 3 rails in tabby’s house and he raged and reported me for it…

Other than that, I have been quite active since the beginning of the server

I’d honestly just use it to only clear land, and if you have noticed, in the past, when I grief, I usually try and let the people know, and its an accident, so if I were to make a mistake with it and blow something up, I’d admit it.

Read full topic

item.title: [OFFICIAL] TNT Applications topic
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

i personally would like permission for tnt. i don’t grief, at all. if i accidentally grief(halflives hidden underground cavern) i always try my hardest to replace what was broken, because i cant stand to be griefed myself. been playing moparcraft for a pretty decent time. recently quit, but am willing to start back up again now that there is a creative mode. have absolutely nothing better to do but play minecraft ALL day long most days, and tnt would help out a bunch when im tunneling.

Read full topic
